title: Flame
description: FLAME (Ruin Outlaws MC #4)An outlaw’s flame will burn even brighter…Mexico. Logan pulled me from my life and dragged me down to this worn and ruined town after our run in with his rival MC crew in Phoenix. What can we do here that we couldn’t do there? What does he plan on doing down here? It doesn’t matter. I’m sick of feeling scared, of feeling helpless. I’m going to do everything in my power to be more than a woman for Logan. I need to be his partner. I can’t be a burden anymore.When an outlaw’s love is stolen, he’ll do anything to get her back…It’s been five years since I crossed the southern border. Last time, I was with Surge and the crew from California. This time, it’s just me and Cassie. Everything feels weird and surreal down here. But that isn’t even the worst of it. Victor Martinez from the drug deal is running things in town, and he has plans for me. But I don’t give a shit about his plans for me, because when he drags Cassie into it, he’s made a grave mistake.I’ll find him. And then I’ll destroy him. As for what lies I keep hearing about Surge, I’ll just have to confront the man himself.From Amy Isan comes Part 4 of Ruin Outlaws MC.#1 Bomb#2 Spark#3 Iron#4 Flame
author: Amy Isan
